Address.label: Address
Address.value: QIANHAI FINANCIAL CENTRE, LINHAI AVENUE,49 FLOOR, BUILDING T1, SHENZHEN, 518000, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Huize Holding Ltd is engaged in offering online insurance products and services in China. The company sells insurance products underwritten by insurance companies. Its online platform offers digitalized insurance services through various internet and mobile internet channels. The company generates a majority of its revenue from the insurance brokerage fees paid by its insurer partners. Geographically, it derives revenue from China.
